div.head: 但欲臥
div.div: one wishes nothing but to lie down/rest/sleep

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: one wishes nothing but to lie down/rest/sleep

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with si wo 嗜臥 , a desire to lie down. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 4: 治食過飽煩悶，但 欲臥而腹脹方 , “Recipe to cure overeating with vexation and heart-pressure, if one wishes nothing but to lie down/rest/sleep and feels abdominal distension”.
